title: 3M pushes back on Trump call to stop sending N95 masks to Canada - Toronto Sun
description: WASHINGTON — One of the biggest American manufacturers of protective medical gear went to bat for its Canadian customers Friday as it pushed back against a White House order to stop exporting…
content: WASHINGTON One of the biggest American manufacturers of protective medical gear went to bat for its Canadian customers Friday as it pushed back against a White House order to stop exporting its surgical grade face masks mission critical armour in the war chars
